text: Teuma di Kamoe meukirem Rasul 3 Mangat takabui peue nyang geupeugah Tataʻat gopnyan ngon izin Tuhan Bek na bantahan peue nyang peurintah Adak meujitem jijak bak gata Lheuh jielanya droejih ka salah Jilakee ampon teuma bak Tuhan Di Rasul Tuhan pih geupeumeu‘ah Geulakee ampon keu jih le Rasul Teuntee Neukabui teuma le Allah Cit jieu Tuhan teurimong tobat Keubit Hadharat Maha Pemurah
